entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [wasm] WBT - tests broken due to old skiasharp package reference #92743
  • SampleProfiler EventPipe provider support for .net 8 Native AOT #92734
    9.0.0
  • tracing/runtimeeventsource/nativeruntimeeventsource/nativeruntimeeventsource.sh Timed Out on Mono OSX x64 with interpreter #92733
  • Correlation payload not found in Build browser-wasm linux Release WasmBuildTests build leg #92732
  • [Mono][Interp] tracing/runtimeeventsource/nativeruntimeeventsource/nativeruntimeeventsource.sh failed #92727
    9.0.0
  • [Android] baseservices/exceptions/unhandled/unhandled/unhandled.sh failed #92723
    9.0.0
  • [mono][aot] Consider moving some huge tests to Pri1 #92722
    9.0.0
  • [QUIC] Port ephemeral key diagnostics on Windows from SslStream #92721
    9.0.0
  • [ARM64][FP16] Convert float/double to half via FCVTH #92718
    Future
  • HostedServiceStartupFaulted is logged with lower LogLevel than BackgroundServiceStoppingHost #92716
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] Invoking async [JSExport] and [JSImport] kills the process on node, but works in browser #92713
  • When a package has native assets for multiple rids the host ignores assets for base rids #92706
  • C# dynamic parameter influences handling methods return #92701
  • JIT: Failed ccmp recognition #92699
    9.0.0
  • ReadOnlySpan<T>(in T) breaking changes #92693
  • Could emit branchless form of i <= 0b00111 && j <= 0b00111 for unsigned integers #92692
  • The compiler does not check that keys returned by the key selector passed to OrderBy are comparable #92691
  • Document HttpClient migration from HttpWebRequest/ServicePoint(Manager) #92690
    9.0.0
  • [mono][aot] Use compile restart to emit a placeholder method body #92688
    9.0.0
  • The native AOT DLL library crash failed to generate a dump or catch an exception #92687

Closed

  • [nativeaot] SYS_SECCOMP signal on Android 9.0 and below #92196
  • ToString format on DateTime not working under Local System Account #92707
  • .NET 8.0.0-preview.5.23280.1 and Entity Framework Core can't read appsettings.json during migration #88046
  • Interop source generators failing build in dotnet/runtime when latest SDK is installed #92655
  • Iterate on config binding generator parsing pipeline to benefit from input caching provided by the incremental-generator feature #83534
    8.0.0
  • Basic Authentication via HTTPClientHandler not working for Android #81839
    8.0.0
  • JIT: stack walk failure in arm64 function fragments #91139
    9.0.0
  • Runtime installer build (packs.product) on Unix doesn't produce a binlog #49891
    Future
  • Runtime test output transcripts in the xml result files use excessive escaping rendering them basically unreadable #92092
    9.0.0
  • [Suggestion] Include msquic along with publish for linux #92598
  • Content security policy issue for embedded browser(chromium) in Blazor Web assembly .js file with eval() #92698
  • [Test Failure] System.Net.Quic.Tests.QuicStreamTests.ReadsWritesClosedFinish_StreamDisposed #92649
  • .NET SDK 7.0.401 and msquic 2.2.0 break HTTP/3 on Linux #92617
  • Increase NativeAOT testing when NativeAOT is changed #72419
    9.0.0
  • Expand CoreCLR testing #67743
    9.0.0
  • Relax DynamicMethod to permit ref returns #92670
  • AspnetCore application tries to load Microsoft.DiaSymReader.Native.amd64.dll at runtime on centos linux #92278
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • LSRA: PreferCalleeSave for non-localVar intervals #92744
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Small refactor to BuildElement to address NRT changes #92742
    area-System.Security
  • [wasm] Fix Wasm.Build.Tests on `main` #92741
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Reenable pragma suppressions for config binder gen (+ JSON) #92740
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Add more static preinitialization support #92739
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Removes redundant code from `JsonCamelCaseNamingPolicy.cs` #92738
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Add analyzer support for inline array access #92736
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Correctly set sendTrustList flag when saving credentials to cache #92731
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [release/8.0] Make config binding gen incremental (#89587) #92730
    Servicing-consider, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [Mono] Disabled failing tests on Mono Android and interpreter lanes to keep CI green #92728
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Report Requires diagnostics from dataflow analyzer #92724
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • WIP: [ios][tests] Trim on helix for libraries and functional tests on CI #92719
    needs-area-label
  • JIT: Promote size-wise improvements in physical promotion #92717
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Vectorize TensorPrimitives.ConvertToHalf #92715
    area-System.Numerics
  • [mono][jit] Fuse SIMD extract and insert on arm64 #92714
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Supress policheck warning in blazor-sample #92711
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Make effect handling in lowering less conservative #92710
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • LSRA: Honor the register aversion decision during allocation #92709
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fold GC.KeepAlive for frozen objects #92708
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [CI ONLY] [NativeAOT] ObjWriter in C# #92705
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Disable MetricsSupport feature by default #92696
    area-Build-mono
  • Fix Common.Tests.GetPrettyName_CannotRead_ReturnsNull test for root user #92695
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Fix target type unsignedness detection in genFloatToIntCast() #92694
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • fix IsMutuallyAuthenticated #92684
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [release/8.0][wasm] Define `getWasmIndirectFunctionTable` before initializing the #92683
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Improve disk full test #92682
    area-System.IO
  • Add plain Vector128 support to IndexOfAnyAsciiSearcher #92680
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0

Merged

  • [release/8.0] Put HasNativeCodeReJITAware into GetFunctionAddress #92665
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Revert "Remove Latin1CharSearchValues (#91884)" #92726
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0
  • Avoid membarrier on lower Android versions #92686
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Updated XML documentation for `IConfigurationProvider.GetReloadToken`. #92720
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] GetChromeVersions: Fix fetching v8 version given a chrome version #92667
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/8.0] Remove all PGO assets except for the runtime PGO archive. #92735
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0] Fix LLVMAOT Mono runtime variant official build to produce correctly named runtime packs #92737
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix LLVMAOT Mono runtime variant official build to produce correctly named runtime packs #92712
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Move more sprintf usages to snprintf #92674
    area-System.Globalization, 9.0.0
  • Remove all PGO assets except for the runtime PGO archive. #92668
    area-Infrastructure
  • Change how test assemblies opt-in to LibraryImportGenerator usage #92661
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • Don't build libraries native packages in the PGO leg #92729
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, blocking-official-build, 9.0.0
  • Make config binding gen incremental #89587
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Add illink analyzer support for field/property initializers #92600
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fix arm64 fragment unwinding #92678
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [ARM64] Emit ldp for unrolled Memcmp #92704
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Make CoreCLR/NativeAOT assembly compile with .subsections_via_symbols on Apple platforms #92544
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix Excessive Encoding in Test Logs #92286
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Switch to etw python script #92508
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add tests for `UnsafeAccessor` on fields on generic types #92657
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, 9.0.0
  • Define bool as Interop.BOOL to prevent upper bytes setting native bool #92679
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Handle remainder accesses more precisely in physical promotion liveness #92651
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Implement Vector128.Shuffle () for llvm on x64. #92656
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [release/8.0] Define bool as Interop.BOOL to prevent upper bytes setting native bool #92681
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] JIT: Fixed containment of STOREIND of HW intrinsics ConvertTo*/Extract* #92513
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [mono][aot] Type load checks do not fail at compile time but produce a runtime exception #91261
    area-VM-meta-mono, 9.0.0
  • Make it possible to preinitialize HW intrinsic IsSupported #92666
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Extend preinitialization interpreter #92470
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0][wasm] Fix regressed file sizes for blazor #92627
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Stop setting separate properties for BUNDLE_PROBE, HOSTPOLICY_EMBEDDED, PINVOKE_OVERRIDE #92448
    area-Host
  • Convert SpinWait to QCall #92675
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Avoiding trying to load the native library Microsoft.DiaSymReader.Native.<arch>.dll on Linux #92492
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Vectorize TensorPrimitives.Min/Max{Magnitude} #92618
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors

Updated

  • [mono] Enable SIMD intrinsics on winx64. #92673
    NO-MERGE, area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Adding AVX512 path to Base64 encoding/Decoding #92241
    area-System.Buffers, community-contribution, arch-avx512, 9.0.0
  • Use a different crossgen2 when running crossgen2 during our build than the crossgen2 that we are shipping #92677
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: Unify and clean up unspilling #91663
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Remove Unwrap flag from UniqueComInterfaceMarshaller #92599
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • LSRA: Update the way we set `delayRegFree` #92496
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Fix regressed file sizes for blazor #92664
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Converge Representations between NativeAOT and CoreCLR #91821
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use P256 for PCP X.509 test #92646
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement
  • Make `TypeDescriptor` thread safe with custom providers by enlarging `lock` region #92521
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • Add new Pipeline for Running Libs Tests with TestReadyToRun #91229
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • Consider numeric string json for EnumConverter. #79432
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • #ifdef out code that requires FEATURE_EVENT_TRACE #91895
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Memory mapped stresslog for NativeAOT #92506
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Convert tests under GC subtree to the merged test model #92543
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [mono][infra] Use llvm toolchain instead of binutils on linux #92057
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [iOS][MacOS] Run tests on iOS 17 and MacOS 14 scouting queues #88479
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm][debugger] Support indexing of valuetype scheme #92637
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [Mono] Enable IL trim for WASM apps by default #90436
    area-Build-mono
  • Move Microsoft.NETCore.DotNetAppHost off of pkgproj #92621
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • WIP: [mono][tests] Enable trimming for libraries and functional tests on CI #92645
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix #91958: use `mach_timebase_info` to determine process time coefficient on macOS #92185
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Fix linux-x64 AOT-llvm perf job #92644
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • WIP: [mono] Clean up internal usage of `RuntimeComponents` to always be treated as MSBuild Item #91800
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization implement japanese calendar data #92471
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Light up String.Manipulation APIs with Vector512 codepath #92579
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [llvm] Fix spilling of valuetypes to the stack if they are passed by … #92658
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [wasm] Use specific version of v8 for library tests #91633
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Update TensorPrimitives aggregations to vectorize handling of remaining elements #92672
    area-System.Numerics
